config.description: If this leaf is set to 'false', then all data nodes in the mounted schema are read-only ('config false'), regardless of their 'config' property.

description.description: This node indicates that the server has mounted at least the module 'ietf-yang-library' at the mount point, and its instantiation provides the information about the mounted schema. Different instances of the mount point may have different schemas mounted.

inlineSchema.description: Contains information about an inline schema mount point.

label.description: Label of the mount point defined using the 'mount-point' extension.

module.description: Name of a module containing the mount point.

mountPoint.description: Each entry of this list specifies a schema for a particular mount point.

namespace.description: This list provides a mapping of namespace prefixes that are used in XPath expressions of 'parent-reference' leafs to the corresponding namespace URI references.

parentReference.description: XPath 1.0 expressions that are evaluated in the parent data tree context.

presence.description: A complete self-contained schema is mounted at the mount point.

sharedSchema.description: Contains information about a shared schema mount point.
